cast.name: 安德列·法雅特 Andrei Fajt
蕾拉·阿伯西兹 Leila Abashidze

introduction: The secret of the mountainDirector: A.Atakishiyev.Screenwriter: M.Tahmasib.Director of photography: A.Narimanbayov, M.Mustafayev.Art director: N.Zeynalov.Composer: R.Hajiyev.Cast of characters: G.Abbasov, T.Kokova, M.Sheychzamanov, A.Gurbanov, A.Gurbanov, A.Fayt, A.Zeynalov.Synopsis: The film - legend for children. The film is about children fighting against Black Powers and about their winning victory.film studio "Baku", 1959, 35mm, 8 parth, 2291m, B/W.Alisattar AtakishiyevDirector, Director of photography, Art director, Costume designer, Screenwriter: (25. 12. 1906 Baku - 07. 12. 1990 Moscow). 1927 - 1931 he studied Postgraduate Art Technical School (Moscow), 1931 -1936 Moscow State Institute of cinematography cameraman department. From 1936 worked cameraman and director "Baku" film studio.
